title: Industrian Revolution
description: In a dystopian world ruled by robots, all traces of humanity are scoured from the automaton populace. Designed to introduce and incrementally advance technology to the human worlds in secret, a section of the citizens of Gyre revolt against the laws that bind them. As lines are drawn and battles waged, a single realization becomes evident. Like a circle divided, they stand on opposite sides ,but are bound by one truth. The ghost haunting the machine of Gyre, is humanity.
author: Tony Rand Scott
